body_html: Please follow the latter instructions. The first one is instructions for pytorch (I believe we will attempt to unify the documentation soon, cc @Yangqing ); or you could also try this script https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/setup_caffe2.py .
body_text: Please follow the latter instructions. The first one is instructions for pytorch (I believe we will attempt to unify the documentation soon, cc @Yangqing ); or you could also try this script https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/setup_caffe2.py .
body: Please follow the latter instructions. The first one is instructions for pytorch (I believe we will attempt to unify the documentation soon, cc @Yangqing ); or you could also try this script https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/setup_caffe2.py .
